charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was on a tour of the
fake supernatural, hosted by Hex Maniac Helena.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_0200:
Because Pasio is an artificial island that was built
so recently, it doesn’t have much history yet...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_0300:
Due to the lack of haunted sites here, rumors
involving the supernatural usually end up
amounting to nothing.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_0400:
On this tour, we will be visiting the various
sites that have spawned these false supernatural
rumors. Welcome to the fake supernatural tour...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_0401_0600:
I still have hope, though. If I continue to track
down these rumors, eventually one will turn out
to be true...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_0402_0800:
Hehehe... Looks like you’ve begun to appreciate
the allure of the supernatural.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_0900:
Let’s get started, shall we? Our first supernatural
encounter is...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_1000: The sighting of a disembodied human soul!
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_1100:
At least, that’s what someone thought they saw.
Turns out it was just a security guard’s flashlight.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_1200:
The guard immediately spoke up, and that was the
end of the rumor...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_1400:
*sigh* It’s useless. Perhaps there aren’t any
supernatural forces left in this world.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_1600:
*pant pant* So sorry. I overslept on the day I was
supposed to lead the tour...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_1700: What’s wrong? Why are you staring over there?
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_1800: Huh? We were just speaking to each other?
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_1900: That’s not possible. I just got here...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_2300:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you’re saying you
were on a fake supernatural tour led by a fake
version of me?
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_2500:
If real supernatural events are occurring around
me, that means...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_2600:
I must have a connection to the
supernatural world!
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_2700: Ehehehe... Perhaps Haunter is excited, too...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_2800:
I hear that the city is becoming more developed—
and that information can now be easily shared
over social media.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_2900:
As clear and accurate information becomes
more accessible, vague rumors about the
supernatural are being taken less seriously.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_3000: Looks like Haunter is upset about this, too...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_3100:
But it seems Pasio may have some mysteries of its
own after all...
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_3200: Perhaps Haunter will feel more at home now.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_3300:
The supernatural is mysterious and scary. That’s
exactly why it piques my curiosity.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_3400:
People spread rumors, and ambiguous rumors
become distorted as they spread.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_3500:
In the end, they remain in this world as tales of
the supernatural!
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_3600:
And among those tales remain a handful of true
encounters... Just like what we saw today.
charaepi_ch0652_68_sayoko/2301_1201_3700:
At least that’s what I like to believe.
Eeeheeheheee!
